audioText: Notre ancien directeur reviendra dans l'entreprise après avoir terminé ses études de management international.
question: When will the former director return to the company?
options: After completing his international management studies
Before the end of this fiscal year
Once the new building is constructed
explanation: The text states 'Notre ancien directeur reviendra dans l'entreprise après avoir terminé ses études de management international' - Our former director will return to the company after completing his international management studies. 'Reviendra' is the third person singular future tense of 'revenir' (to return).
